availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Richmond, Madison County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Son of William H. Caperton and Eliza Caperton. Attorney in Richmond in 1850. Attorney in Richmond in 1860. Murdered in Richmond by Frank Searcy on or about November 7, 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Richmond, p. 252A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Richmond, p. 147.
Find A Grave, "Woods Caperton (1820-1860)," Memorial #25965823, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/25965823 (accessed March 25, 2020).
